entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @WhiteHouse So the constant increases in the states not on a coast doesn’t matter?  1 in 229 people in this state have or have had Coronavirus.  The federal prison in Forrest City has had over 750 infected and state prison Cummins has had over 1100 infected and several deaths.  FU ALL!
